sentences.chinese: 人家暢飲智慧之泉，他只是拿來漱口了。

sentences.english: It's part of the job description. - …
He stood, huddled by the open fire, gazing at the dying embers.
sentences.chinese: 他只是木然地站在爐火旁，看着那漸漸滅去的灰燼。

sentences.english: She may be not much, just want to let you stay with her.
sentences.chinese: 她也許要的不多，只是想讓你陪陪她。

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片顯示面積活躍在即席講話只是後，毗鄰的腫瘤。

sentences.english: But the Dallas-based carrier isn't just looking at Boeing.
sentences.chinese: 但這家總部位於達拉斯的承運商不僅僅只是眷顧波音。

sentences.english: This is one of many cultural chasms across the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 這只是橫跨大西洋的諸多文化鴻溝之一。

sentences.english: In particular this means that this file is not malicious but a false alarm .
sentences.chinese: 這意味着，這個文件是沒有惡意的，只是虛驚一場。

sentences.english: Is it too much to ask for a little precipitation?
sentences.chinese: 只是下點小雨也不可以嗎？

sentences.english: Don't take it to heart. They are just babes and sucklings.
sentences.chinese: 不要放在心上，那些只是些乳臭未乾的小子。

sentences.english: All you need is a shortcrust pastry, a well made egg custard, and a sprinkling of nutmeg.
sentences.chinese: 所有你需要的只是，一個油酥鬆餅，蛋，和肉豆蔻灑。

sentences.english: These nonsense letter, they are only the night-blooming cereus blossom from the fingertip.
sentences.chinese: 這些胡言亂語的文字，它們只是指尖開出的曇花。

sentences.english: For Clarissa, the entree is just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 對克拉麗莎來說，主菜只是是個開頭。
他們只是方框和線條圖。

sentences.english: If be the fade of little scope only, so complete and OK oneself are its complementary color .
sentences.chinese: 假如只是小範圍的掉色，那麼完全可以自己爲它補色。

sentences.english: I'm fine, just a little down.
sentences.chinese: 我很好，只是有些意興闌珊。

definition: a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
